,AhmedSheshtawy,2011-01-12T21:45Z,"1st the game is retail so it don't need a crack indeed
2nd guys i'm the only seeder for more than 200 person .. please seed and don't be selfish

3rd you may face problems (specially with Macbooks) after installing the game .. as you may see a black screen while the sound of the game is already playing .. so if you got this all you should do is the following:-
1- you should copy the game to your applications Folder
2-click and hold CMD button and double click the game .. an options screen will appear
3- choose (In a Window) instead of (Full Screen) then click OK
4- Now the game will launch normally but in window view
5- after the intro ends and the main menu appears click CMD and Enter .. now it's in full screen
6- everytime you will launch the game it will launch in windows view and you should click CMD + Enter after the intro video"

,AhmedSheshtawy,2011-01-15T02:12Z,"Some bugs may appears under Mac 10.6.5 and later version 10.6.6
Crashes are not because of a game bug but the game was designed to work under Mac OS 10.6.4
anyway the game works fine on my Macbook Pro under 10.6.6
and here is a reply from Aspyr about the blue or black screen that happened sometimes under Mac OS 10.6.5 and 10.6.6
From Aspyr:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting Aspyr Technical Support!

This issue is caused by the latest 10.6.5 update which we are currently working with Apple to resolve. Please hold down the command (apple) key when launching the game in order to bring up the initial configuration screen to select Windowed mode. Once in the gameâ€™s main menu, select Options then Video Options to return the game to Full Screen.
Feel free to contact us with any further issues or concerns.
Thank you,
Aspyr Technical Support"
,orenheb,2011-01-15T05:04Z,"Yes Ahmed

,AhmedSheshtawy,2011-01-15T19:28Z,@orenheb: I totally agree with you
,Fallstaff,2011-01-15T23:17Z,"Easy fix for the black screen:
Edit “Documents/Aspyr/Sid Meier’s Civilization 5/UserSettings.ini”
Change SkipIntroVideo = 0
to
SkipIntroVideo = 1"
